resources.string: Success!
New resource created
Request accepted
Information may not be from the original source
No data to show
Content has been reset
Only part of the content is available
Multiple status codes apply
There are multiple options available. Please choose one.
The content has been moved permanently to a new location.
The content has been found, but it\'s temporarily located elsewhere.
Please see a different resource for the information you\'re looking for.
The content hasn\'t changed since your last request.
You need to use a proxy server to access the content.
Please switch to a different proxy server.
You\'re being temporarily redirected to a new location.
The content has been permanently moved to a new location.
Oops! There was a problem with your request. Please double-check and try again.
Hold on a second: It looks like you need to sign in first.
We\'ll need a payment to access this.
Sorry, you\'re not authorized to see this.
Hmmâ€¦ We can\'t seem to find what you\'re looking for.
Whoops! That action isn\'t allowed here.
Sorry, we can\'t accept that request.
Authentication required through a proxy server. Please check your settings.
The request timed out. Please try again.
Uh oh, something\'s in conflict.
Sorry, that\'s no longer available.
We\'re missing some information here. Please provide a length.
A precondition wasn\'t met. Let\'s check those requirements.
That\'s a bit too much to handle. Could you try sending less?
That request is a little too long. Can you shorten it up?
We\'re not familiar with that media type.
We can\'t fulfill that exact request range.
The server couldn\'t meet those expectations.
We\'re having trouble processing that.
Hold on, that\'s locked for now.
Something it depends on is missing.
Whoa, too soon! Try again later.
Time for an upgrade!
Easy there! We\'re getting a lot of requests right now.
Those request headers are a bit too big.
Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
This feature is not currently available.
We\'re experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
We\'re currently down for maintenance. Please try again soon.
It\'s taking longer than expected to process your request. Please try again.
We don\'t support the version of HTTP you\'re using.
We\'re unable to fulfill your request at this time.
We\'re out of storage space. Please try again later.
